title: WTF! RIOT Y R U NOT GOING TO BE AT PAX?
body: WTF RIOT! i am going to pax east 2015 this year and after last years pax where you guys nearly had the main booth, you guys don't even have one after a big year of LoL! Every year there are tons of cosplayers that cosplay as LoL characters, probably 1/3 of the atendies play lol or have heard of it, not to mention all the new players you will pick up from such great advertisement. I was really looking forward to seeing what you guys had in store this year, but i am truly disappointed... {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}}

replies.body:
Hey RampJ,

Although we're scaling down our presence at PAX East, we'll still be there in form of speaker panels and a cospitality lounge. Several of us will also be attending for fun, so if you see us, feel free to say hello! :]
Will there been skin codes (e.g. riot kayle, dragonslayer panth, arcade MF, etc) available from the Rioter presence at PAX east, or are those only for events where riot has a more substantial role?

Slowly cutting off ties with the east coast so they dont get bugged about the servers >:D

*evil Rito laugh*
